flavorText: The forest's cover offers shade, shelter, and an increased risk of sudden death.

foreignData.flavorText: Das Blätterdach bietet Schatten, Schutz und ein erhöhtes Risiko für einen plötzlichen Tod.
foreignData.name: Blätterdach-Schleicher
foreignData.text:
Der Blätterdach-Schleicher muss geblockt werden, falls möglich.
Wenn der Blätterdach-Schleicher stirbt, erhältst du für jede Kreatur, die in diesem Zug gestorben ist, 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: El escondite del bosque da sombra, refugio y una gran probabilidad de tener una muerte súbita.
foreignData.name: Acechador de la enramada
foreignData.text:
El Acechador de la enramada debe ser bloqueado si se puede.
Cuando el Acechador de la enramada muera, ganas 1 vida por cada criatura que murió este turno.

foreignData.flavorText: La surface boisée fournit de l'ombre, de la protection, mais aussi un risque accru de mort soudaine.
foreignData.name: Pisteur de la canopée
foreignData.text:
Le Pisteur de la canopée doit être bloqué si possible.
Quand le Pisteur de la canopée meurt, vous gagnez 1 point de vie pour chaque créature qui est morte ce tour-ci.

foreignData.flavorText: La chioma della foresta offre ombra, rifugio e un elevato rischio di morte improvvisa.
foreignData.name: Predatore delle Fronde
foreignData.text:
Il Predatore delle Fronde deve essere bloccato, se possibile.
Quando il Predatore delle Fronde muore, guadagni 1 punto vita per ogni creatura morta in questo turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 森の茂みは日を遮り、隠れ場となり、襲われる危険を増やす。
foreignData.name: 梢の忍び寄り
foreignData.text:
梢の忍び寄りは、可能ならブロックされなければならない。
梢の忍び寄りが死亡したとき、あなたは、このターンに死亡したクリーチャー１体につき１点のライフを得る。

foreignData.flavorText: 숲의 지붕은 그늘과 은신처, 그리고 현격히 높아진 갑작스런 죽음의 위험성을 함께 제공한다.
foreignData.name: 숲그늘 추적자
foreignData.text:
숲그늘 추적자는 가능하면 방어되어야 한다.
숲그늘 추적자가 죽을 때, 당신은 이번 턴에 죽은 각 생물마다 생명 1점을 얻는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Graças ao dossel há sombra, abrigo e um risco maior de morte repentina.
foreignData.name: Espreitador do Dossel
foreignData.text:
Espreitador do Dossel precisa ser bloqueado se estiver apto.
Quando Espreitador do Dossel morre, você ganha 1 ponto de vida para cada criatura que morreu neste turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Лесные кроны дарят тень, убежище и повышенный риск внезапной смерти.
foreignData.name: Охотник Крон
foreignData.text:
Охотник Крон должен быть заблокирован, если это возможно.
Когда Охотник Крон умирает, вы получаете 1 жизнь за каждое существо, которое умерло в этом ходу.

foreignData.flavorText: 茂密树林既提供了遮阳树荫、栖息处所，也让致命猎手有了可乘之机。
foreignData.name: 树冠伏猫
foreignData.text:
若能阻挡树冠伏猫，则必须阻挡之。
当树冠伏猫死去时，本回合中每有一个生物死去，你便获得1点生命。

foreignData.flavorText: 茂密樹林既提供了遮陽樹蔭、棲息處所，也讓致命也讓偷襲獵手有了可乘之機。
foreignData.name: 樹冠伏貓
foreignData.text:
若能阻擋樹冠伏貓，則必須阻擋之。
當樹冠伏貓死去時，本回合中每有一個生物死去，你便獲得1點生命。

name: Canopy Stalker
originalText:
Canopy Stalker must be blocked if able.
When Canopy Stalker dies, you gain 1 life for each creature that died this turn.

rulings.text: Only one creature is required to block Canopy Stalker. Other creatures may also block it, and are free to block other creatures or not block at all.
The defending player, not you, chooses which creature blocks Canopy Stalker.

If each creature the defending player controls can't block for any reason (such as being tapped), then Canopy Stalker isn't blocked. If there's a cost associated with blocking Canopy Stalker, the defending player isn't forced to pay that cost, so it doesn't have to be blocked in that case either.
Canopy Stalker's triggered ability counts itself, as well as any other creatures that die before the triggered ability resolves.
If your life total is brought to 0 or less at the same time that Canopy Stalker is dealt lethal damage, you lose the game before its last ability goes on the stack.

text:
Canopy Stalker must be blocked if able.
When Canopy Stalker dies, you gain 1 life for each creature that died this turn.
